messages.content: Whatâ€™s the easiest way to get to New York City from Los Angeles?

The easiest way to get to New York City from Los Angeles is by taking a flight. There are several airlines that offer direct flights from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) to John F. Kennedy International Airport (JFK) or Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) in New York City. The flight takes approximately 5-6 hours. Alternatively, you could also take a train or drive, but these options would take significantly longer.
Can I take the subway to LAC?

If you are referring to LAX (Los Angeles International Airport), then no, there is no subway that goes directly to LAX. However, you can take the Metro Rail Green Line to the Aviation/LAX Station, which is the closest station to LAX. From there, you can take a free shuttle called the LAX Shuttle "G" to the airport terminals. Alternatively, you can also take other forms of public transportation such as buses or ride-share services.
